  • Method Details

    • setControls

      public void setControls(char option, int subjectControl, int replacementControl)
      Update the functionalities of key presses.
      Parameters:
      option - what to do to the subject control
      subjectControl - the control in question to change
      replacementControl - the control to replace it with

    • controls

      public void controls(HashSet<Integer> keysPressed)
      Handle all movement of the avatar ball.
      Parameters:
      keysPressed - the HashSet of all currently depressed keys
